mikejyg.texasHoldem
Class Dealer

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      mikejyg.texasHoldem.Dealer

public class Dealer
extends java.util.Observable

this class deals cards to table and hands; It also scores them; It uses model-view-controller architecture this is the model (dealt cards)
